name: Murato
description:
FLAVOR:

  • Heavily armored, heavily armed

  • Get in the middle and let them come to you (CHOMP)

  • Big hits are BIG HITS

WEAPONS

  • Martial, heavy, great

  • Heavy armor, shields, all helms

ENGAGEMENT

  • Few large dice

  • Few success options, domination-focused

ABILITIES

  • Big swing followed by skip turn

  • Endurance economy: can use in addition to MP?

  • Injury resistance?

  • Hand cannoneer?
